about_the_game:
Building on the success of Tyler’s 5th 50 set, this pack returns with more dynamic monster silhouettes perfect for battle or logos

Building on the monsters from his 5th 50 pack, Tyler Warren returns with something dark and menacing. These 50 monster silhouettes are prefect for adding some horror/mystery and depth to your next project. These images are multifunctional and can be used as battlers, logos, or incorporated into other ambience within your game world. Specifically designed with form and shape in mind, these monsters have character all their own.

Features:

* 50 unique silhouettes for use at battlers, logos, or ambience
* Includes matching facesets
* Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker MZ, MV, VX Ace and other RPG Makers
* All battlers are presented in sizes ranging from large to small
* Add these to Tyler’s other battlers and fill your library with 400+ exciting characters for your next RPG Maker Project!

Credit Tokiwa Graphics and Joel Steudler for the awesome battle backgrounds used in the title and screenshots

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* Not OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers 9th 50 - 50 More Shades" and "RPG Maker MV - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers 9th 50 - 50 More Shades" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
